file_summary: This document serves as the comprehensive README for the Spring PetClinic Sample Application. Its primary purpose is to guide users through understanding, setting up, running, and contributing to this example Spring Boot application. The README provides detailed instructions on how to run the application locally using Maven or Gradle, including command-line execution and integration with popular IDEs like Eclipse, Spring Tools Suite (STS), and IntelliJ IDEA. It covers various database configurations, defaulting to an in-memory H2 database, but also explaining how to connect to persistent MySQL and PostgreSQL instances, including Docker commands for quick setup. Additionally, the document explains how to build container images, compile CSS resources, and highlights testing approaches. It points to key configuration files and provides information on interacting with other open-source projects and contributing to the PetClinic repository.
